name: metadata-import-dicom
label: Metadata Import and Validation: DICOM
description: Metadata Import and Validation for DICOM files. This Gear will parse, import, and validate DICOM header metadata. Those metadata are added to the input file's metadata object (<inputFile>.info). Optionally a metadata validation template can be provided as input to the gear. When that template is provided the gear will use that information to further validate the DICOM metadata.

json_template.description: A JSON template to validate DICOM data

author: Flywheel
